text: Richard Boyle was an American football player and coach. He served as the head football coach (1939–1941, 1946–1949) and head baseball coach (1950–1958) at San Francisco State University. Boyle played college football at Saint Mary's College of California, where he was instrumental in the 1930 Saint Mary's Gaels football team's upset of Eastern powerhouse Fordham. ==Head coaching record== ===Football=== ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:American football halfbacks Category:Saint Mary's Gaels football players Category:San Francisco State Gators football coaches Category:San Francisco State Gators baseball coaches
title: Dick Boyle (American football)
